code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ArmstrongChecker=()=>{const[number,setNumber]=useState('');const[result,setResult]=useState(null);const checkArmstrong=()=>{const num=parseInt(number);if(isNaN(num)||num<0){alert('Please enter a valid positive number');return;}const str=num.toString();const numDigits=str.length;let sum=0;for(let digit of str){sum+=Math.pow(parseInt(digit),numDigits);}const isArmstrong=sum===num;setResult({number:num,isArmstrong:isArmstrong,calculation:str.split('').map(d=>"".concat(d,"^").concat(numDigits)).join(' + ')+" = ".concat(sum)});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"program-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"program-title",children:"Armstrong Number Checker"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"armstrong-number",children:"Enter number:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{id:"armstrong-number",type:"number",value:number,onChange:e=>setNumber(e.target.value),placeholder:"Enter a number"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn",onClick:checkArmstrong,children:"Check Armstrong"}),result&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"result-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"result-title",children:"Result:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"result-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"armstrong-result ".concat(result.isArmstrong?'armstrong-true':'armstrong-false'),children:[result.number," is ",result.isArmstrong?'':'NOT ',"an Armstrong number"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginTop:'10px',fontSize:'14px'},children:["Calculation: ",result.calculation]})]})]})]});};export default ArmstrongChecker;
